error.403: Smappee API has denied access to this device
error.404: Device not found in Smappee account
error.led: LED brightness is not supported by this device

notification.water_capability_updated: Water capability updated for **__name__**. Check your flows.

service.error: The Smappee __service__ throws an error, the device may not work as expected.
service.disconnected: Connection to Smappee __service__ has been lost, the device may not work as expected.
service.offline: Cannot connect to the Smappee __service__, check the internet connection.

warning.disconnected: Device is disconnected, the device may not work as expected.
warning.unreachable: Device is unreachable, the device may not work as expected.
